author: dblevins
msg: For statics and	logging, improved the Pool.Supplier.discard() method so	that it	says why an instance was discarded: FULL, AGED, IDLE, FLUSHED
Provide	the option to immediately replace aged instances
Apply MaxAgeOffset when refilling the pool after a flush

author: toulmean
msg: fix for BUILDR-405 Enhance the idea7x extension to supply a task to delete generated files

author: sdeboy
msg: If the file-save as menu is provided a file ending in .zip, a zip file will be created containing an xml file of the event contents.
Fixed a minor bug in the goto-line logic preventing line navigation if a loaded file's rows did not start at 1.

author: lektran
msg: Following on from r930477, removed another reference to currency for EditProduct's quantityUomId field.  Thanks for the report Jacopo.
